Hey, I am Pratik. I am an engineer and a self-taught graphic designer living in Bangalore.

I pay my bills working as a software developer at TCS BaNCS.

I read books, draw doodles, write nonsense, and cycle very little.

I also occasionally take pictures on my iPhone and post them on Flickr (why not Instagram, you ask? Well, Iâ€™m not a fan of their compression algorithm).
